name: Bryb
culture_notes: Coastal Tongue dialect with Island Creole loanwords
seafood-centric diet; preserved fish staples common
dockside ritual gift-exchange and strong tide superstitions
constraints: no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: near-medieval to early-industrial tech baseline with localized ritual magic
population unknown; functions as a small coastal outpost
serves as a waypoint for ships and ritual supply lines
